content: vacation shawl * 2 2 by susan *i created this pattern when i was going on vacation and i needed a simple shawl to knit while my husband was driving it s a garter stitch triangular shawl with sections of easy lace throughout yarn 2 skeins of berroco fiora yarn dk weight each skein is 100 g 246 yards us size 6 circular needles 40 inch cord gauge is not critical for this project and i suggest using a needle size that gives the shawl a nice drape if you are a tight knitter i suggest using a larger needle size finished size approximately 63 inches from end to end and 22 inches deep at widest point cast on 3 stitches set up row knit until last stitch kfb section 1 row 1 rs knit all stitches row 2 knit until last stitch kfb repeat row 1 and 2 until there are 10 garter stitch ridges on the right side of the fabric do not count the cast on row you will have just completed a row 2 start section 2 below section 2 row 3 k1 *yo k2tog repeat from * until 1 stitch remaining k1 row 4 k until 1 stitch remaining kfb row 5 k1 *yo k2tog repeat from * until end of row row 6 k until 1 stitch remaining kfb row 7 k1 *yo k2tog repeat from * until 1 stitch remaining k1 row 8 k until 1 stitch remaining kfb repeat sections 1 and 2 ten more times or until you are close to the end of your yarn leave enough for bind off bind off loosely lightly block if needed or desired abbreviations rs right side of fabric kfb knit front and back of stitch yo yarn over k knit k2tog knit 2 together
